Napier 11yo singer-songwriter scoops 2024 NZ Children’s Music Award for original song https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-11-year-old-singer-songwriter-scoops-2024-nz-childrens-music-award-for-original-song/ CKDD3SGQ2JGB5AWUWENGYWJZH4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-11-year-old-singer-songwriter-scoops-2024-nz-childrens-music-award-for-original-song/ CKDD3SGQ2JGB5AWUWENGYWJZH4/ James PocockLydia Clark will perform her song with the Auckland Philharmonia in two concerts. Fri, 24 May 2024 06:10:06 +0000 Lydia Clark, 11, won the inaugural Kokako Award at the NZ Children’s Music Awards for her performance of Of Love We Are Made, a song she composed with her 15-year-old brother Finn. Photo / Paul Taylor
University of Waikato students join nationwide protest for Gaza ceasefire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/university-of-waikato-students-join-nationwide-protest-for-gaza-ceasefire/GBVN4OU7NRGRBOOCFEA4NDVATU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/university-of-waikato-students-join-nationwide-protest-for-gaza-ceasefire/GBVN4OU7NRGRBOOCFEA4NDVATU/ Maryana Garcia'What is happening in Gaza is genocide. We don’t want to be neutral.' Fri, 24 May 2024 05:59:20 +0000 More than 100 students gathered at the doors of the University of Waikato library as part of a national protest against Israel's actions in Gaza. Photo / Maryana Garcia
Police continue search for man who fell off ferry on Wellington Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-continue-search-for-man-who-fell-off-ferry-on-wellington-harbour/VHGANFCTVJBZBCG7KKD6P2JZPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-continue-search-for-man-who-fell-off-ferry-on-wellington-harbour/VHGANFCTVJBZBCG7KKD6P2JZPY/ The ferry had been travelling from the city to Days Bay in Eastbourne. Fri, 24 May 2024 05:55:42 +0000 A person is reportedly missing after falling overboard on an East by West ferry in Wellington Harbour this morning. RNZ / Angus Dreaver

Fri, 24 May 2024 05:29:24 +0000 Police officers at the scene of a fatal stabbing at the central city bus hub near the Dunedin police station on Great King St. Photo / Ben Tomsett
State Highway 3 crash: Truck and car collide on Ohaupo Rd near Hamilton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-3-crash-truck-and-car-collide-on-ohaupo-rd-near-hamilton/YRHQQIYBHZGIZJTRL5AXAJAVFU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-3-crash-truck-and-car-collide-on-ohaupo-rd-near-hamilton/YRHQQIYBHZGIZJTRL5AXAJAVFU/ Maryana GarciaThe road between Hamilton and Te Awamutu remained closed on Friday afternoon. Fri, 24 May 2024 05:21:00 +0000 One person has been critically injured in the Ohaupo Rd crash on SH3 between Airport Rd and Douch Rd. Photo / Maryana Garcia
Parliament to launch aged care inquiry to satisfy National/NZ First coalition agreement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/parliament-to-launch-ged-care-inquiry-to-satisfy-nationalnz-first-coalition-agreement/V4XIG42ARVFX3DZHJHVU6RBANQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/parliament-to-launch-ged-care-inquiry-to-satisfy-nationalnz-first-coalition-agreement/V4XIG42ARVFX3DZHJHVU6RBANQ/ Adam PearseHealth NZ is conducting its own review into aged care's funding and service models. Ratepayer funding for Northland emergency services and sport facilities to continue - Northland Regional Council https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/ratepayer-funding-for-northland-emergency-services-and-sport-facilities-to-continue-northland-regional-council/HGIZOJQE7JGTXMWHF5ATAPZD2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/ratepayer-funding-for-northland-emergency-services-and-sport-facilities-to-continue-northland-regional-council/HGIZOJQE7JGTXMWHF5ATAPZD2E/ Mike DinsdaleRegional council backs down from proposal to cut support after consultation backlash. Fri, 24 May 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Northland Regional Council has voted to continue its funding of emergency services in the region, such as the Northland Rescue Helicopter, after huge opposition from the public to dropping the funding
